page.title: 01SOUTHALL GREENFORD HANWELL
page.content: The two towns in our block are {Southall}and{Greenford.}We also include about half of{Hanwell.}All three are part of the London Borough of Ealing. There is a lot of parkland along the four kilometers of the River Brent, which runs through this area, plus nearly a square kilometre of open land beside the Grand Union Canal. Southall has one of the largest Asian communities in the country. People say that almost anything you can buy in India, you can buy in Southall. Despite some factory closures there are many different local enterprises. Workers not employed locally mostly commute into London or Heathrow Airport. Although people know that in some respects conditions could be better, there is a quiet pride among people of all cultures at the area's successes.
